amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of sections 85-1647 and 85-1648, lending agency shall mean (1) any private postsecondary career school or (2) any entity (a) controlling, controlled by, or held in common ownership with such a school or (b) regularly lending money to such a school or to students of such a school.
